screenshot.alt: Screenshot of a .purs file in Microsoft Visual Studio Code
screenshot.caption: PURS file open in Microsoft Visual Studio Code

description: Developer Phil Freeman created the PureScript programming language in 2013. PureScript was Freeman's attempt to create a Haskell-like language that compiles cleanly to JavaScript. The language is now developed and maintained by a community of GitHub users. Its source code files are saved with the .purs extension.
